conversation.content: I want to find underwear that offers comfort and a good fit, especially as I go through changes in my body due to weight loss. Breathability and a pleasant wearing experience are also important to me. within my expected price range: [7.9, 30.0]

Based on your budget range and preferences for comfort, fit, and breathability, I recommend the Fruit of the Loom Women's Breathable Underwear (Regular & Plus Size) (B0C547R51F) priced at $29.48. This underwear is designed to keep you cool and fresh all day long. If you decide to purchase this item, I also suggest considering the potentially purchasable candidate for additional options.
I'm interested in the Fruit of the Loom Women's Breathable Underwear (Regular & Plus Size) (B0C547R51F) you recommended. Can you tell me more about its fit and comfort level?

The Fruit of the Loom Women's Breathable Underwear (Regular & Plus Size) (B0C547R51F) is designed to keep you cool and fresh all day long. It offers a comfortable fit with soft leg bands, a smooth waistband, and a 100% cotton liner for extra softness. If you decide to purchase this item, I recommend considering the potentially purchasable candidate, the Vanity Fair Women's Beyond Comfort Hi Cut Panties (B0B26CCBH5), priced at $36.0, for additional options.
Can you provide more details about the Vanity Fair Women's Beyond Comfort Hi Cut Panties (B0B26CCBH5)?

The Vanity Fair Women's Beyond Comfort Hi Cut Panties (B0B26CCBH5) are designed to provide the comfort you deserve with different fabrication options. The Seamless Waistband collection offers an extremely soft, seamless waistband for all-day comfort. The Silky Stretch collection has silky soft fabric that glides under your clothes. The Modal collection is luxuriously soft and lightweight. These panties ensure full rear coverage and a 100% cotton gusset lining for added comfort.
